__e: Chinese food is quite easy to get, and it's cheap too, and...
Invite her up for one of them grilled cheese sandwiches and orange soda.
Because I know a place down here. It makes a delicious chicken sandwich.
Well, I'm afraid I'm short on cash, friend, but I've got some sandwiches and fruit in the bag...
We will drink the tea and we will eat the sandwiches and then we will drive on.

I know. I'm just packing it for tomorrow because, you know, I figured if I get all the sandwiches in for tomorrow, then, if he forgets, it's OK, cos, like, she has sandwiches for every day of the week.
